about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Professional Background & Education
about.intro: I excel at solving real-world engineering challenges with innovative, practical solutions. With experience across automotive, mining, and manufacturing, I deliver measurable improvements in design, efficiency, and cost. I focus on creating smarter, sustainable processes that exceed expectations and drive impactful results.
about.description: I specialize in mechanical design using SolidWorks, focusing on cost reduction and efficiency improvements in automotive and bearing industries. My work at ZF AG Transmissions and IBC Iran (SKF) has involved designing precision components, assembly tools, and implementing Lean Manufacturing and Six Sigma methodologies.
about.description1: I specialize in mechanical design using SolidWorks, focusing on cost reduction and efficiency improvements in automotive and bearing industries.
about.description2: With a Master's degree in Manufacturing Engineering from University of Tabriz (GPA: 3.69/4.0) and expertise in CAD design, CNC programming, and statistical analysis using Python, I am passionate about innovation and eager to contribute to Sweden's advanced engineering sector.
about.swedenReason: I am a passionate Mechanical Design Engineer with deep expertise in SolidWorks, cost optimization, and sustainable manufacturing. With over 5 years of professional experience at leading companies like ZF AG and SKF, I have designed 50+ components, achieved €50,000 in annual savings, and reduced maintenance costs by 30%. I specialize in transforming complex engineering challenges into efficient, cost-effective solutions.
about.value1Desc: Driving continuous improvement through creative engineering solutions
about.value2Desc: Working effectively with global teams to achieve common goals
about.value3Desc: Designing with environmental impact and resource efficiency in mind
